name: Vi8
description:
You are captain red, with her trusty wingman, captain blue. the evil alien race, known only as emacs, are coming to destroy all of mankind.

Get into the cockpit of your vi-per-8, and defend the universe by defeating the six bosses.

God speed and good luck.

The Android version of this game has only been tested on the OUYA.

Feel free to play the web version as well!

This game was made by @josefnpat for the October 2015 OneGameAMonth challenge.
